explanation: [0-0] On a machine, a hand wearing a blue glove is holding a steel bar bent into a square frame.

[0-7] Then the hand wearing the blue glove pulls the square frame to the right of the screen, and then the machine cuts off the square frame. Subsequently, a steel bar extends from the machine, and then the machine works to bend the steel bar that has just been extended into a square frame.
